summary: If you wear any of the Imperial Armor set (Imperial Cuirasses) or any of the Stormcloak Cuirasses you will be attacked by those who oppose your uniform and the alliance it represents.
descriptionHtml:
If you wear any of the Imperial Armor set (Imperial Cuirasses) or any of the Stormcloak Cuirasses you will be attacked by those who oppose your uniform and the alliance it represents. You can also wear the uniform to sneak into your enemies camps, fort, town and cities. This will not take in affect until the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Civil_War]Battle for Whiterun[/url] quest is completed. This mod works great with the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76423/?]Civil War Ambushes[/url] mod. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1024/?]here[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
